Identifica la responsabilidad individual/es de algún aspecto del marcaje de un elemento/s particular.
indica i soggetti responsabili della codifica di determinati elementi

fornisce l'identificatore dell'elemento a cui è attribuita una certa responsabilità
attDef.valDesc: one or more valid identifiers, separated by whitespace.

attDef.desc: supplies an XSLT 2.0 pattern which may be used to select those portions of the document responsibility for which is to be specified.
attDef.valDesc: The pattern should be expressed using the pattern syntax defined in .

remarks.p: The context for the pattern is the nodeset identified by the value of the target attribute. If no value is given for target, the context is the document root.

Note that the value of the target attribute may include an Xpointer expression which may include an Xpath expression (see ). Either method may be used to identify the parts of a document responsibility for which is to be documented by this element.

attDef.desc: indicates the specific aspect of the markup for which responsibility is being assigned.

当該電子テキストのある面にに責任のある個人や主体を示す．
Identifie la personne ou l'organisme responsable de l'aspect en question dans le document TEI
indentifica el individuo o grupo responsable del aspecto indicado en un texto electrónico.
indica il soggetto responsabile dell'aspetto del test elettronico
attDef.valDesc: a pointer to one of the identifiers declared in the document header, associated with a person asserted as responsible for some aspect of the text's creation, transcription, editing, or encoding

remarks.p: The respons element is designed for cases in which fine-grained information about specific aspects of the markup of a text is desirable for whatever reason. Global responsibility for certain aspects of markup is usually more simply indicated in the TEI header, using the respStmt element within the title statement, edition statement, or change log.

L'élément respons est préconisé dans les cas où une information très fine sur des aspects spécifiques du balisage d'un texte est souhaitable pour une raison quelconque. Une responsabilité globale pour certains aspects du balisage est habituellement indiquée simplement au niveau de l'en-tête TEI en utilisant l'élément respStmt dans la mention de titre, la mention d'édition ou le journal de modifications.
当該要素responsは，テキスト中のある特定要素について，詳細 な情報を示すためのものである．全体的な責任については，ヘダー中にあ るタイトルや版，変更履歴に関するタグの中で使われる要素 respStmtで示されるのが一般的である．
